dct_title_s: A MAPP OF ALL THE WORLD
dct_description_sm: Goos type map, and too small for place names.
America divided into three sections labeled Canada, Virginia and N. Spaine.
Hemispheres surrounded by night and day, the signs of the Zodiac, and seasonal reprsentations.
In: Atlas Minimus or A Book of Geography Shewing all the Empires, Monarchies Kingdomes, Regions Dominions Principalities and Countries, in the whole World , Map [1], London, [1678].
by John Seller Hydrographer to the King.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
